author: cmpilato
msg: On the '1.7.x' branch, merge changes from the '1.7.x-r1242759' branch:
Fix various issues with GNOME and KDE keyring providers, especially
as regards how their interact with --non-interactive mode.  Fixes
("gnome keyring --non-interactive fail with password on disk").
Fixes user-reported problem which significantly limits

author: jleroux
msg: Edit Estimated Ship Date or Estimated Delivery Date brings on date format error (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5045). A patch from Paul Foxworthy: The patch adds an if statement to ignore members of the isdm and iddm maps with keys that have a suffix of _i18n.
